entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Charlo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:59 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlo 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
Temperature: -5.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -7.8°C
Wind: E 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
